2003:
January &
February
Xzii's raid was first. We had an amazing mass of participants from EF, COS, and Rascals for the raid on the General in Kithkor. We even had a much appreciated guest appearance from our friend Polyx... All kinds of good loot dropped and Tawindy from CoS won the roll on a nice RMB for her guild. Gratz CoS. We spawned and killed the General 3 times back to back so a Rascals rogue and another rogue could also get epic piece components! I know the rogue from the Rascals also has his epic after this.

After this epic raid, we ran to SF. Thanks to EF, PB , CoS, and IL we dropped that pesky Rage and his human form like a bowling ball on a pillowcase. In one of the most entertaining displays of overkill of all time, Ursi got her epic piece no problem! Gratz to Rathgard who picked up a plasmatic priest robe from the human form - one less part of his epic he'll have to do...
By Ursi
XZII AND URSI BOTH OBTAIN THEIR EPICS SUNDAY NIGHT
Photo by Gwarf
March & April
Click on pic for bigger view
Congratulations to Valathia (47 enchanter) and Grimscythe (60 ranger) on your promotions to the Honor Guard. They are well - deserved and we look forward to working with you!
By Ursi
Valathia and Grimscythe promoted to Honor Guard
5/15/03
Last month, Sindee hosted a party at the Arena where among the many duels, awards and promotions were handed out by Arathain. Little did Sindee know that she would be a recipient of both!

Mantrena, Tanluin and Macolic have stepped down from the High Council to live their lives as Sages of the Fellowship. Their fine service to the guild will always be appreciated and we thank them greatly for it. This opened the door for some new promotions. After serving us so well for many months, Plaxibo and Gilgamesch have moved up to the High Council. Also joining them was one of our founding members as well as a former member of the HC, Wamphyre! Promoted to the Honor Guard were Idylla and Sindee!
By Kamdar
And here is a recap of our recent promotions...
and the medals go to...
The first Guildees to win the Dragon Slayer Medallion are Thallus who helped take down Trakanon, Malya who had a part in taking down Vox, and Daliddar assisted in the slaying of Ragefire the night before the party! There also was another recent slaying of Ragefire that many EF'ers were involved in. Please congratulate Qural, Ursi, Sindee, Berina, Ashmael, Karmyn, Skynight, Rivin, and Rathgard for also being recipients of the coveted Dragon Slayer Medallion!

The Rescue Medallion is given to members who are successful in pulling corpses out of extremely dangerous places. Chastisy has been awarded the Rescue Medallion for her assistance in corpse runs on several occasions.

The Benevolent Tradesman Medallion is awarded to those who put their trade skills to good use for the guild. Thallus has earned this award through fletching nightmare bows for the guild.

The Good Conduct Medal is given to members who continually show selflessness and kindness to other members. These guildies are a blessing to have among our ranks. New recipients of the Good Conduct Medal are Sindee, Boffle, and Valathia.

A belated congratulations to every award recipient and promoted Fellowshipper! And keep yer eye out... cuz next time will be handing out some EPIC Medallions! Unless you've been living under a rock, you know that Xzii and Ursi have completed their Epics... and I'm sure there are more to come!
Sindee laughs it up at the Arena!
As some of you no doubt heard, we lost a good friend this week. Many of us knew him as Warmadz, a friendly Shaman Barbarian with a big heart. Unfortunately, Warmadz's journey with us is over. His user Scott Cole has passed away. Please join us in Halas, Sunday evening, June 1st as we say goodbye to our dear friend. For more details make sure to keep checking the "Fellowship Lodgings" section of our forum.
By Kamdar
5/24/03
The Fellowship loses a friend
